name: The Ravine (Artfully3D)
description:
Learned how to create an environment in Unreal 4 over the course of one week. Made use of some of the Open World content from Unreal and modeled the rest in Maya LT 2017. Textures were created in Substance Painter.

Audio:  Piano Music" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com), Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License, http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
